Name: Dwarves Craft. Father's home
About the game: Cory, a craftsdwarf, has moved to his aging father to help him take care of and restore their home and its surroundings! 150 colored picross puzzles of varied difficulty, a gripping story, charming music - all this together will let you spend your free time in a fun and enticing way! A great opportunity to challenge yourself by solving puzzles! Complete levels, solve puzzles and help the dwarves restore their old home! - 150 unforgettable colorful levels! - vibrant graphics! - repair the house! - an exciting journey! - bright Summer-like colors! - a great way to train your logical and abstract thinking! - easy-to-use UI and engaging gameplay!
